My preferred way of getting through my neighborhood is by myself. I detest the idea of going on casual walks and taking walks alone, as I also feel uncomfortable when I'm in a rush to escape people's attention.

I experience a constant sense of being watched and judged, even when there is no one present outside. This can make me feel like I'm being evaluated and treated differently than those I was exposed to.

It's true that I enjoy a sunny day and chilly nights both. However, my fear of being alone at the beach makes it challenging to have an enjoyable day on vacation while enjoying the solitude on snowy winter nights.
